name: MagicBall
0:
”Alexa, open Magic Ball”
”Alexa, ask Magic Ball if I should never see Rachel again”
”Alexa, ask Magic Ball if I will ever run the Boston Marathon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic ball
des: Magic Ball reaches into the future, to find the answers to your questions. It knows what will be, and is willing to share this with you. Just think of a question that can be answered "Yes" or "No", concentrate very, very hard, and ask your question. Then let Magic Ball show you the way! It might not be the answer you expect, but it'll get you thinking!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
